body.name: MUBVIEW Light Bulb Security Camera - 5G& 2.4GHz WiFi Security Cameras Wireless Outdoor Indoor, 2K Bulb Camera with Full-Color Night Vision, AI Human Detection, Siren, SD Cloud Storage
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 9 hrs 7 mins
features: 【5G& 2.4GHz Supported & Fast installation】Are you still frustrated by unreliable networks? MUBVIEW's 5G and 2.4GHz dual-band light bulb camera provides more Wi-Fi options, making the network connection smoother and never offline. Installing our MUBVIEW bulb security camera is as easy as installing a regular light bulb in a standard E27 socket (110V~240V). No wiring or drilling is required. Just follow the app prompts to set up your Wi-Fi in minutes.

【2K HD Video & Starlight Color Night Vision】 The light bulb security camera outdoor offers super clear 2K 3MP images, making it easy to see everything during the day and night. Updated with the latest tech in 2023, our security cameras wireless outdoor now have color/smart/infrared night vision. Even in complete darkness, you'll get a clear view of all the details within a 33ft range, giving you a fantastic night vision experience.

【No Monthly Fee & Family Sharing】 The outdoor camera can record 24/7 videos, saving them in a lifetime-free and secure cloud service (7-day loop recording) and on a Micro SD card (not included, up to 128GB). This way, you can easily view and share your cherished moments. The wifi camera allows multiple people to view the video simultaneously so that you can share access with your family and friends. Plus, one app can control up to four security cameras at once.

【AI Motion Detection Analysis & Instant Alerts】Motion detection supports light socket security camera precise object tracking within a 360° field of view(355° Pan and 100° Tilt). With advanced intelligent AI motion detection technology and adjustable sensitivity, the bulb camera can easily identify people, vehicles, pets, and packages while minimizing false alarms and unnecessary notifications. Plus, set up a customized motion area and schedule to meet your family's needs.

【Two-Way Audio & Premium Support】Equipped with built-in microphones and speakers, you can communicate with family and courier through the home security cameras. When uninvited guests are in your home, you can scare them away with the alarms. It's also compatible with Alexa and Google Assistant, enabling voice control of the camaras de seguridad. MUBVIEW offers a 2-year warranty, lifetime technical support and service, and responsive local customer service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy Security and a Great Value
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I purchased this camera to add pan/tilt functionality to a location on my property where I currently have a static wifi security camera. The unit comes well packed in a box that has security-seal stickers and a sealed outer wrapping, which are nice because all too often new device packages have no security features and you don't know if what you've bought is actually new. The camera itself has some heft to it - it's a bit heavier than similar cameras I have and feels quite substantial. The battery took 4 or 5 hours to charge to full capacity from its shipped condition and seems to be draining 2.5% a day without the solar panel connected (haven't used that yet so I can test the battery capacity).Camera installation was easy - a template is provided to locate the holes for the mounting bracket, and the camera twist-locks into the mount. I already had the required app installed because I use the same brand of doorbell. All I needed to do to get it running was add the camera to the device list; now both cameras are available in the one view, which is convenient. I use a wifi range extender for my cameras, so this one has no problem connecting to my network.The image quality, time to connect, and pan and tilt responsiveness are all very good. The zoom is of course digital, and while an optical zoom would be great, including that feature would probably triple the price.While the camera is excellent, it turns out that my favorite feature so far is the integrated motion sensing floodlight. It's very bright (though adjustable to a lower level if need be). The alley/corner area where I have the camera mounted is very dark at night and while I could put up a dedicated solar-powered light, it's great to have one included. All in all, the Mubview camera is well worth the modest cost. I may just get an additional one for another location.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Switched from a poorly performing ring system to this & never looked back. After wasting weeks to install and get the spotlight pro to work, it kept draining too fast & the solar panel was a joke. At 1st it was a no brainer to go w/ Ring bc everyone did but their service failed so bad on top of increased annual fees, 2 devices = double the charge. Long story short it literally said on the box the solar panel EXTENDS the life of the battery, meaning it's inevitable to climb up there to fetch the battery. Noped out of the whole headache and installed this camera setup, not expecting much and BOY AM I GLAD I ditched my old system. This is not to bash Ring but in direct comparison this camera along with their doorbell not only have a sharper picture but perform much better overall. Cherry on top is zero fees & FULL BATTERY nonstop, once it's up that's it. I checked the battery consumption carefully and the panel does an outstanding job keeping it fully charged. Absolutely worth every penny, swivels around for an angle that covers the entire frontside of property (usually requires 2 cameras). The app is easy to navigate but could improve in simplicity of layout. The unit itself feels good quality, you'll love the taste of freedom!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Superior Camera with Great Features!
reviews.reviewText: Excellent resolution, superior range and night vision, excellent support and customer service! Having owned 4 other brands of security cameras, I was surprised and pleased at the superior operation of the Mubview DX2 security camera, and I now have 2 of them plus 2 other fixed-mount Mubview cams. Easy to install and operate, this 2-antenna, remote-controlled camera delivers quick response, very high resolution and remarkable range when mounted at an impressive distance from my router. My "Brand X" cams could not compete with the Mubview cameras, either in resolution or range, and the DX2 is worth every penny. I have replaced all of my other security cams with Mubview cameras, as they offer lots of easy-to-use features along with actual software/hardware updates. The 2-way audio is very clear, making it easy to talk with visitors or delivery people without letting them know whether I'm actually home or not (even from as far away as France and Italy!). Mubview support is quick to respond to any questions and is very customer-oriented. I have recommended Mubview cameras to several friends and neighbors; you won't be disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very happy with camera
reviews.reviewText: Great day and night vision! Clear picture in both settings. Motion detection is very good. I live on a busy street thought it would pick up all the traffic, but it actually does not. Was easy to install. Spot light works great! I have a doorbell from the same company very happy with both. Worth what I paid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars not sure what to think about this company
reviews.reviewText: not quite ready for general use, can only be viewed on smart phones, can not be viewed on a computer or on a tablet , app will not function, customer support is terrible, they will not answer any questions, could have bin a great product. g

The media could not be loaded. I love this security camera, the picture quality is excellent and it detects movement and saves a video clip of what it records.It notifies me whenever movement is detected.It allows me to change the sensitivity of movement depending on what sensitivity I would like it to detect. The siren and light flashes to let people know that it is starting to record. It has two way communication, you can speak and hear through it. The solar panel is great. The solar panel is always filled to 100% and works all night and morning non stop. It was easy to setup and the installation instructions were easy to understand.Also a great price this product !

pour la configuration, je ne savais pas sur quel caméra clicker dans l'application, kaia du soutien technique, m'a répondu en quelques heures pour m'expliquer le fonctionnement et j'ai pu configurer la caméra en quelques minutes. très bon service du soutien technique. l'installation de la caméra est très facile, je l'ai installé en 15 minutes. je peux observer partout dans l'entrée de la maison ainsi que dans le stationnement de ma voiture et encore bien plus. super caméraYvesAprès quelque semaine j’avais un problème avec l’écran solaire, la batterie ne se rechargeais pas. J’ai communiqué avec la compagnie et il m’ont fait parvenir un nouvel écran solaire. Très bon service de KaiaYves
Le logiciel de contrôle pourrait être amélioré.
